long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A calendar that helps you keep track of your progress of some daily habit/goal. It is meant to serve as a visual motivator to help you keep at your goals.

The creation was inspired by the "Every Day Calendar" by Simone Giertz @ http://www.simonegiertz.com/every-day-calendar , which is a physical and awesome version of this extension.
